edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.subroutines

Class CutAndChooseVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.subroutines.CutAndChooseVerifier

  • public class CutAndChooseVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Cut And Choose verifier used in the protocol.

    The cut and choose paradigm is an important building block in the offline/online Yao protocol.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

      • CutAndChooseVerifier

        public CutAndChooseVerifier(ExecutionParameters execution,
                    CryptoPrimitives primitives,
                    Channel[] channels,

                    KProbeResistantMatrix matrix,
                    java.lang.String filePrefix)
        Constructor that sets the parameters and creates the commitment objects.
        Parameters:
        execution - Contains parameters regarding the execution.
        primitives - Contains primitives to use in the protocol.
        channels - The channel that communicates between the parties.
        bundleBuilder - Contains the circuit parameters and used to build the circuit.
        matrix - Used to transform p1 inputs to the extended inputs.

      • CutAndChooseVerifier

        public CutAndChooseVerifier(ExecutionParameters execution,
                    CryptoPrimitives primitives,
                    Channel[] channels,
                    BundleBuilder bundleBuilder,
                    KProbeResistantMatrix matrix,
                    int[] inputLabelsY2,
                    java.lang.String filePrefix)
        Constructor that sets the parameters and creates the commitment objects.
        Parameters:
        execution - Contains parameters regarding the execution.
        primitives - Contains primitives to use in the protocol.
        channels - The channel that communicates between the parties.
        bundleBuilder - Contains the circuit parameters and used to build the circuit.
        matrix - Used to transform p1 inputs to the extended inputs.
        inputLabelsY2 - The input wires' indices of p2. Sometimes these indices are not the same as in the given circuit.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException,
                CheatAttemptException
        Run the verifier execution. Pseudo code: 1. Send to the cut and choose prover the commitments on the circuit selection and mapping. 2. Receive the garbled circuits 4. Receive commitments on the keys 5. Send the cut and choose challenge 6. verify the checked circuits 7. Put circuits in buckets 8. verify correctness of placement mask
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        CheatAttemptException

      • getBuckets

        public BucketList<LimitedBundle> getBuckets()
                                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        Returns the buckets that include the evaluated circuits.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
